# DuckDB's Wild Ride in the Open Source World ft. Co-creator Mark Raasveldt

2023/09/08

Mehdi interviews Mark Raasveldt, CTO of DuckDB Labs and co-creator of DuckDB just before DuckCon in San Francisco. He aimed to gain some insight into the behind-the-scenes workings of the open-source project. Enjoy the conversation!
